showScoreExcerpt:
"For anyone who appreciates delicacy, charm and intimacy in their musicals rather than the big, high-kicking, and splashy kind, there's nothing to beat 'She Loves Me. '
And when it comes to musical revivals it doesn't get better than the Roundabout Theatre Company's new production. Scott Ellis has tapped into all 'She Loves Me's' charms with renewed vigor and flair...If you're looking for a good time, it's a sure bet that you'll love 'She Loves Me.'"
